treatment-md.title: Leptoiulus tigirek Mikhaljova, Nefediev, Nefedieva & Dyachkov, 2015, sp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: Genus Leptoiulus Verhoeff, 1894 new to the fauna of the Asian part of Russia, with description of a new species from the Altai and its comparison with the European Leptoiulus trilineatus (C. L. Koch, 1847) (Diplopoda, Julida, Julidae)
